shared_text:
TCT Federal Credit Union
May 19 at 4:14 PM ¬∑

Congratulations to this week's Teacher of the Week.....Mr. Girard Marcino, Physics Teacher at the South Glens Falls High School.
"Mr. Marcino has taught at South High for over 20 years and is retiring this year. He not only teaches Physics, but he does a great job preparing his students for college and the real world! Mr. Marcino has been known to come in on Saturdays each year to help students study for their A-P and Regents exams and staying late on weekdays to help students after sports. A few years ago, South High students were asked to nominate a teacher to speak at graduation and Mr. Marcino was the first pick and gave a memorable life lesson as his address. South High will be losing a legend when Mr. Marcino retires this year and the students thank him for all of his efforts through the years!"

Congratulations Mr. Marcino for being this week's Teacher of the Week.

post_text: This fall, Tanglewood Elementary School teacher Jamie Metivier and our district were the recipients of a $100,000 Farmers Insurance Grant to fund a "Kindness Closet," which will provide household necessities to less fortunate members of our school community. Next steps? On June 10, 2019, there will be a community forum for people who would like to get involved in this initiative. Those interested should RSVP by June 5 to metivierj@sgfcsd.org or via this form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1M34Pp1LzkfOD9umfTPIyYe_ysvxIw8ZPNQZtdKinyP0/viewform?edit_requested=true. #WeBelieveinSGF

UPDATE: Due to a network issue, the district has had to cancel this event!

Senior citizens looking for some help with technology are invited to attend our first ever "Cyber Seniors" night! We'll have South Glens Falls students on hand to help you navigate technology! Three short workshops will be offered, including tips for how to stay safe online and how to navigate social media. The event will take place today from 4-6 p.m. at the South Glens Falls HS Library Media Center, 42 Merritt Road.
